accueil.metaDesc: Homepage of the clothing designer 100% made in Quebec, designed by TIM students using AI-generated designs, and made with 100% natural and organic fibers.

accueil.para1: Today, the t-shirt is an essential garment in everyone's wardrobe. And in an era where environmental concerns are more important than ever, we prefer t-shirts made in Quebec to reduce environmental impact and highlight local craftsmanship.
accueil.para2: V-neck t-shirt, crew neck, loose or fitted, short sleeves or long sleeves for the cold-sensitive, plain or patterned to style an outfit‚Ä¶ The t-shirt is available in a variety of colors, styles, and patterns.

teeshirts.metaTitre: teeTIM // Discover our 100% natural t-shirts designed in Quebec
teeshirts.metaDesc: Discover our collection of 100% natural t-shirts, designed in Quebec by TIM students, combining style, comfort, and respect for the environment.

casquettes.metaTitre: teeTIM // Discover our 100% natural caps designed in Quebec
casquettes.metaDesc: Discover our caps made locally in Quebec, combining artisanal know-how, superior quality, and commitment to local business.

hoodies.metaTitre: teeTIM // Discover our 100% natural hoodies designed in Quebec
hoodies.metaDesc: Discover our hoodies made locally in Quebec, combining artisanal know-how, superior quality, and commitment to local business.

aide.metaDesc: Need help? Check out our FAQ section for answers to your questions about orders, delivery, and more.

apropos.metaDesc: Learn about teeTIM: a student initiative creating sustainable clothing in Quebec using natural fibers and AI-assisted designs.
